channel.title: RMDB news
channel.description: The RNA Mapping Database is a repository of experimental results on RNA structural probing using mapping (a.k.a. footprinting) techniques. This feed gives news updates relevant to the databse.

item.title: RMDB entries for SHAPE-Seq experiments on RNAse P (B. subtilis) have been posted! See entries RNASEP_SHP_0000 and RNASEP_SHP_0001
item.description: RMDB entries for SHAPE-Seq experiments on RNAse P (B. subtilis) have been posted! See entries RNASEP_SHP_0000 and RNASEP_SHP_0001

item.title: If you use the RMDB in your investigations, please cite our draft paper located in the arXiv (article id 1110.0235).
item.description: If you use the RMDB in your investigations, please cite our draft paper located in the arXiv (article id 1110.0235).

item.title: Self registration is now available. Go to the registration page to start submitting your data!
item.description: Self registration is now available. Go to the registration page to start submitting your data!
